Description: Body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black; part of rosette in added white outline with added red on alternate petals; exterior: painted decoration consisting of bull (part of tail and rump remaining) to right.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0548) (phase 2)
